AI Description: R-s4vectors is an R package that provides an efficient implementation of vectors with support for various data types and structures to represent data as vectors in R programming language. It offers enhanced performance and functionality for vector operations and manipulation.
Core Features: Efficient Implementation Of Vectors In R, Support For Different Data Types & Structures, Enhanced Performance For Vector Operations, Flexible & Versatile Data Representation
General Tags: R Package, Vector Operations, Data Manipulation, Programming In R
